name: <CARTO_SERVICE_ACCOUNT_NAME>
hint: The name of the service account that has necessary permission to run carto-template. eg: carto-sa, the one you created during clustertemplates configurations process

name: <WORKLOAD_TYPE_NAME>
hint: Workload type for which the supply chain will be triggered. eg: web

name: <SOURCE_TEMPLATE_NAME>
hint: The name of the cluster source template that is responsible for defining GitRepository from FluxCD. eg: source

name: <TEST_TEMPLATE_NAME>
hint: The name of the cluster source template that is responsible for defining process for source code test. eg: test.

name: <IMAGE_TEMPLATE_NAME>
hint: The name of the cluster image template that is responsible for defining image creation process. eg: kpackimage.

name: <CONFIG_TEMPLATE_NAME>
hint: The name of the ClusterConfigTemplate that is responsible for generating config/deployable for git-ops. eg: app-config.

name: <GIT_WRITER_TEMPLATE_NAME>
hint: The name of the ClusterTemplate that is responsible for writting config/deployable to git repo for git-ops. eg: git-writer.
